"VOIRY,ANTOINE (HP-France,ex2)" wrote:

> Hi all,
> I wonder if there is some Junit classes or extensions to do unit testing
> with castor generated classes.
>

If you're referring to Castor XML, I'm not sure what could reasonably break.
I've used Castor on a few projects in the past, and I don't remember writing
unit tests for the getter/setter methods, as I was reasonably sure they would
return/update the underlying XML.  I do remember testing the methods that
ultimately used the Castor objects at a higher level, but not the generated
classes themselves.

Anyway, I never got burned.  YMMV, of course.

Mike
